item.title: Crazy Kick!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Crazy Kick is a crazy and cool football game, there are many levels waiting for you, try to pass all of them! Avoid your opponents who want to kick your football out of the field. Collect coins and keys to unlock new skins. Don’t miss our new sport game Crazy Kick, you will like it!Slide […]
item.content:encoded:
Crazy Kick is a crazy and cool football game, there are many levels waiting for you, try to pass all of them! Avoid your opponents who want to kick your football out of the field. Collect coins and keys to unlock new skins. Don’t miss our new sport game Crazy Kick, you will like it!
Slide on the screen to control the ball, fast slide to shoot.

item.title: Perfect Slices Online
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Perfect Slices Online is not only a slicing but also a relaxation arcade game with 3D game art animation. It is managed for you to slice all the objects like carrots, eggplants, and other food to get enough scores. Come on and challenge in Perfect Slices Online!Mouse click or tap the screen to play
item.content:encoded:
Perfect Slices Online is not only a slicing but also a relaxation arcade game with 3D game art animation. It is managed for you to slice all the objects like carrots, eggplants, and other food to get enough scores. Come on and challenge in Perfect Slices Online!
Mouse click or tap the screen to play

item.title: Fast Madness
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Fast Madness is a fast-paced car avoidance game, get in your car and start your racing! You need to control the car, avoid those dangerous cars on the road, if you crash into them, you will lose. It’s hard, keep trying to get a high score and show your talent! Have a good time in […]
item.content:encoded:
Fast Madness is a fast-paced car avoidance game, get in your car and start your racing! You need to control the car, avoid those dangerous cars on the road, if you crash into them, you will lose. It’s hard, keep trying to get a high score and show your talent! Have a good time in Fast Madness!
Use mouse or tap to play

item.title: Epic Race 3D
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Epic Race 3D is recommended as both a running and racing arcade game with 3D stickman game art animation. Each level has two rounds which means you have to win at least the second place in the first round. Keep calm and avoid all the obstacles to win in Epic Race 3D!tap
item.content:encoded:
Epic Race 3D is recommended as both a running and racing arcade game with 3D stickman game art animation. Each level has two rounds which means you have to win at least the second place in the first round. Keep calm and avoid all the obstacles to win in Epic Race 3D!
tap

item.title: Hunter Assassin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Hunter Assassin is not only an assassin arcade but also a stealth simulation game with 3D game art animation. It is managed for you to hunt the pointed quantity of the enemies. Be aware of the bullets from them, you are unable to accept several bullets. Keep calm and have fun in Hunter Assassin!tap
item.content:encoded:
Hunter Assassin is not only an assassin arcade but also a stealth simulation game with 3D game art animation. It is managed for you to hunt the pointed quantity of the enemies. Be aware of the bullets from them, you are unable to accept several bullets. Keep calm and have fun in Hunter Assassin!
tap

item.title: Sky Roller Online
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Sky Roller Online is a very exciting pulley Parkour leisure game. The core of the game is Parkour. You can challenge all kinds of Parkour maps and tracks with different skating equipment. Keep sprinting forward to avoid all kinds of obstacles and collect diamonds along the way, have fun in Sky Roller Online!Slide on the […]
item.content:encoded:
Sky Roller Online is a very exciting pulley Parkour leisure game. The core of the game is Parkour. You can challenge all kinds of Parkour maps and tracks with different skating equipment. Keep sprinting forward to avoid all kinds of obstacles and collect diamonds along the way, have fun in Sky Roller Online!
Slide on the screen to play

item.title: Jungle Dash 3D
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: In this 3D running game Jungle Dash 3d, you will be running in the jungle. Jump to avoid all kinds of obstacles. The farther you run, the higher your score will be. Don’t forget to collect coins on your road. Wish you can have a good time in our new game Jungle Dash 3d!Arrow key […]
item.content:encoded:
In this 3D running game Jungle Dash 3d, you will be running in the jungle. Jump to avoid all kinds of obstacles. The farther you run, the higher your score will be. Don’t forget to collect coins on your road. Wish you can have a good time in our new game Jungle Dash 3d!
Arrow key to move, click to jump

item.title: Bread Pit
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The Bread Pit is an interesting physics puzzle game. This is an adventure about toast. The player’s task is to send toast to the toaster to complete a toast task. In the process of the game, players need to get three cheeses and get star rewards. See how many levels you can pass in the […]
item.content:encoded: The Bread Pit is an interesting physics puzzle game. This is an adventure about toast. The player’s task is to send toast to the toaster to complete a toast task. In the process of the game, players need to get three cheeses and get star rewards. See how many levels you can pass in the Bread Pit!

item.title: Archer Warrior
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Archer Warrior is recommended as an archery arcade game on three-dimensional horseback. You are a warrior who is good at riding and shooting. You need to shoot the enemies and destroy the obstacles to complete each level. Have fun Archer Warrior!Slide on the screen to play
item.content:encoded:
Archer Warrior is recommended as an archery arcade game on three-dimensional horseback. You are a warrior who is good at riding and shooting. You need to shoot the enemies and destroy the obstacles to complete each level. Have fun Archer Warrior!
Slide on the screen to play

item.title: Mini Truck Driver Master
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Mini Truck Driver Master is actually not a car driving game but a vehicle avoiding arcade game that is made of 3D pixel game art animation. In a traffic jam on this busy day, you are asked to drive your vehicles as long distance as you can on all the four tracks on the street. […]
item.content:encoded:
Mini Truck Driver Master is actually not a car driving game but a vehicle avoiding arcade game that is made of 3D pixel game art animation. In a traffic jam on this busy day, you are asked to drive your vehicles as long distance as you can on all the four tracks on the street. In fact, I strongly suggest you stay at the right two tracks slowly but easily get high scores. Please just entertain with Mini Truck Driver Master!
Tap – gas, Slide – change track
